entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 09:21 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle and a few flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
